column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=We are in the midst of a violent storm .
#Text=I can help lead Florida and the nation through this tempest .
#Text=For many years , you lived in New Hampshire and represented it in the Senate .
#Text=Seeing as you moved to Florida relatively recently , many are wondering if you know the state well enough to run for office in it .
#Text=Do you feel that you are familiar enough with the issues many Floridians are facing such as skyrocketing unemployment , rising taxes and the foreclosure crisis ?
#Text=I am no stranger to Florida .
#Text=My family and I have been enjoying Florida ’s beautiful beaches and natural treasures for the last 40 years .
#Text=My wife and I have lived in Sarasota for over six years .
#Text=Since we made Florida our home , I have worked in the real estate business and served as a founding director of a community bank .

#Text=In addition , I spent three years as President of The Everglades Foundation , a non-profit organization headquartered in Miami , whose mission is restore and preserve the Everglades through community awareness and public-private partnerships .
#Text=I have enjoyed being a leader on issues affecting Floridians during much of my career .
#Text=When I was the Chairman of the Senate Environment and Public Works Committee , I worked with Governor Jeb Bush to restore the Everglades .
#Text=I sponsored legislation funding Everglades restoration and guided the bill to passage by the Senate and the House .
#Text=In addition , I am a proven advocate for issues about which Floridians feel strongly , including :
#Text=fiscal prudence ,
#Text=protecting veterans and strengthening the military ,
#Text=recognizing the importance of the space industry to the future and security of the country ,
#Text=healthcare reform , and
#Text=protecting our state ’s and our nation ’s borders .
#Text=I have faced the issues of unemployment , taxes and foreclosures in Congress throughout my career in Congress .
#Text=When I was elected to the House of Representatives in 1984 , the country was just starting to recover from the recession of the early 1980 ’s .
#Text=I participated in the response to the Savings and Loan crisis , which was similar to the current crisis in cause , if not in scope .
#Text=When I became a U.S. Senator in 1990 , it was not long before the country was in the midst of another recession and housing crunch .

#Text=Though it proved to be the prelude to a much worse crisis , I also was involved with the actions taken by Congress to respond to the bursting of the technology stock bubble earlier this decade .
#Text=It is hard for me to sit on the sidelines during these troubling times .
#Text=Republican Floridians need a seat at the table while the President and Congress are making decisions that will affect the future of our nation .
#Text=As a senior senator , I can provide that seat at the table .
